Medium: Oak lower moldings and feather keys; lime upper moldings. Carved, gilt; orange bole.
Dimensions: Overall, 83.3 x 96.7 cm; sight, 56.2 x 70.2 cm; rebate, 60.7 x 74.6 cm.
Description: The sight-edge rocaille has a particular elegance on this horizontal frame in the style of Jean-Baptiste Pillement (1728-1808), a painter and ornamental designer who worked in Lyon.
